name: My favorite season
description: Top reasons fall is my favorite season

name: Hedric the Hedgehog
description: Let me tell you all about my new family number! his name is Hedric and he weighs less than a pound.  Did I mention he is a hedgehog!

name: Spooky season
description: It's halloween! Tonight we are getting ready for costume contest party.  We decided to dress as the Stanger Things characters because we're obssessed.
